alert.note: Alert for Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 8:39PM CDT until May 27 at 8:35AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cottonwood River near Florence affecting Marion County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cottonwood River near Florence. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Minor flooding of the left bank and roads along the north bank will begin. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 22.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 4.4 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Cottonwood River Florence 22.0 22.2 Thu 8 pm CDT 8.4 5.2 4.6 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
